‘'''W'''isdom’, from a scientific perspective, could be viewed simply as ‘knowledge in context’. Yet functionally, ‘'''W'''isdom’ is far more textured and multidimensional.
 
‘'''W'''isdom’, from a scientific perspective, could be viewed simply as ‘knowledge in context’. Yet functionally, ‘'''W'''isdom’ is far more textured and multidimensional.
−
The modern western scientist who has conducted the most visible and thoughtful research on this topic is [[Jonas Salk]], in his companion reports “[[Survival Of The Wisest]]” ( http://www.amazon.com/survival-wisest-Jonas-Salk/dp/006013738X ) and “[[Anatomy Of Reality]]” (http://www.amazon.com/s/ref=nb_ss_b/104-7050689-6708737?url=search-alias%3Dstripbooks&field-keywords=Anatomy+of+Reality&Go.x=8&Go.y=5).
+
The modern western scientist who has conducted the most visible and thoughtful research on this topic is [[Jonas Salk]], in his companion reports “[[Survival Of The Wisest]]” ( [http://www.amazon.com/survival-wisest-Jonas-Salk/dp/006013738X] ) and “[[Anatomy Of Reality]]” ( [http://www.amazon.com/s/ref=nb_ss_b/104-7050689-6708737?url=search-alias%3Dstripbooks&field-keywords=Anatomy+of+Reality&Go.x=8&Go.y=5] ).

Line 60: Line 60:  
4. The ability to create timely scientific solutions that are pleasing to Man, while not being in violation of the timeless laws of Nature.
 
4. The ability to create timely scientific solutions that are pleasing to Man, while not being in violation of the timeless laws of Nature.
    −
In its simplest form, Salk summarized his scientific research on ‘Wisdom’ with the “'''Good Ancestor Principle'''”:
+
In its simplest form, Salk summarized his scientific research on ‘'''W'''isdom’ with the “'''Good Ancestor Principle'''”:
     
'''''“…the most important question we must ask ourselves is ‘Are we being good ancestors?’ Given the rapidly changing discoveries and conditions of the time, this opens up a crucial conversation – just what will it take for our descendants to look back upon our decisions today and judge us good ancestors?”'''''
